website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a way to add to your light display with images, this is a good projector choice.
pros: Can project 8 images in a rotation
Patterns show up clearly and bright when projected
cons: The slides are nice, but it would be even better if it came with more options

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear picture
customer_reviews.text: Boiught this in hopes that it would project a clear picture on our pole barn, it’s amazing. We love the animation, not like a motion picture but it does the trick. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and Easy Christmas Decoration!
customer_reviews.text: We love decorating for Christmas and good new items are always a welcome addition to our decorations. We love this, it's easy to use and we can move it around the house to our needs, we are keeping it next to the tree and projecting on the wall, but we also have it outside for decoration. We plan on using it for a party soon to projecting on the wall in the foryer for guests to enjoy when they arrive. To top it off, it really keeps the kids happy and they love how it changes images, it keeps them busy for hours! We are going to buy another one to keep outside for our garage door.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Wife thinks its cute.
customer_reviews.text: I got this and set it up inside to test it out. My wife came home and thought it was really cute so we are keeping it inside. There are really 16 pictures here, 8 sets of 2. Each set gets about 10 seconds where it jumps between the two photos to produce the impression of animation. The only setting is on or off. I'm projecting onto a 14 foot high ceiling and the picture is bright and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck G

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time. Upon receipt and invoicing it was ready to assemble the stand with the light and seems to be of sturdy construction. The light itself is great. Bright colors and different patterns are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Didn’t rotate images until I accidentally fixed it by dropping it on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Nieswandt

customer_reviews.title: Product Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: It worked all of about 30 minutes. It was a horrible disappointment. It seemed very cheaply made and not at all what was applied!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Smith

customer_reviews.title: Small projected image
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small image is projected...regardless of how close or how far away the projector was placed. Large, 2 story house on acres of land, so all distances were attempted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was boring and uninteresting.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product as it features three different boring pictures intermittently.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H. Ekunwe

customer_reviews.title: Nice at a great price
customer_reviews.text: It's cool, no one else in my neighborhood has the same one which I like. The automatic 6/18hr timer is a nice feature. Only reason I took a star off is because a couple of the picture slides are a little off center so a small bit of the edge cuts off. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: good for holiday
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are cute and the projected colors are vivid. a good decoration for holiday, can`t wait to setting it up for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: B. Liang

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, this is adorable :]
customer_reviews.text: Came a little broke, but, still works so we kept it. Good buy :]
customer_reviews.author: Linh Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Multiple images
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars just because is not what I was expecting. The unit is well build and good quality. I was expecting multiple images not one at the time.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, easy to set up and come with eight different pictures. Make the house so pretty! It is a perfect gift for my son. He is so excited about it. It is worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Rainne

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Plan on spending some time to watch all the images. Some are bigger than others, so the surface you use might not be big enough. May need to adjust closer or farther. Then clarity might become an issue. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Drop from table then stop working
customer_reviews.text: immediately after opened box, it dropped from my desk to the carpet, then it stops to rotate thus only a single image shown on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: cheng hong

customer_reviews.title: Great project!
customer_reviews.text: This product packed very well,easy instructions on how to set up, it’s great for decorating the home and garden .Automatic changeable pattern are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: The images weren’t as well defined as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not as big of a projection as I anticipated. Didn't even begin to cover garage door. Only way to shut it off was to unplug. Need an on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jan W

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: An amazing flashlight with diverse clips inserted in to show different patterns. It's perfect for festival preparation. It is pretty cool! All family members love this projector. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelvein

customer_reviews.title: Different experience coming
customer_reviews.text: Finally got an easy-to-assemble-decoration Christmas coming! Very excited! Can hardly wait!
customer_reviews.author: Yi Babies

customer_reviews.title: Nice and clear pictures.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, the device projects very clear and bright images. Good selection of pictures. It is good idea to add a little more vibrant holiday spirit to your holiday home.
customer_reviews.author: Zoning

customer_reviews.title: Party
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and focus well on my house. Instruction simple and my kids are ready for hollowween. Plus it’s waterproof. Worth every pennies
customer_reviews.author: wenhan yu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This year the Christmas lighting is going to be so much better!
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product all of my neighbors loved driving by watching the display.
customer_reviews.author: Cameshia Burdette

product_meta.title: 1byone Christmas Decorations Light Projector, 8in1 Auto-Shifting Images and Auto-Switchable Pattern, Outdoor/Indoor Use, IP65 Water-Resistant
feature_bullets: Animated Projection Effects - Bid farewell to dull static projectors! Each pattern in the Christmas Projector Light contains 2 frames of animation for more lively holiday fun. A great addition to your Christmas decorations, new and gentle led light for better eye protection.
8 Auto-Switching Patterns - No need to manually change slides! The four dynamic Christmas patterns automatically switch every 10 seconds to bring more joy with less effort.

Improved Brightness and Clarity - Dual PMMA lenses are age-resistant and allow over 92% of light to pass through, meaning more brightness and clear images with zero fading for more than 6 years of normal use, providing great decoration for many Christmases to come.

High-Quality Materials and IP65 Waterproofing - This projection light is rated IP65 for great weather resistance and encased in environmentally safe and wear-resistant engineered plastic for great use indoors and out. Not recommended to be soaked in water or very heavy rain, but great for performing in normal weather conditions.
Reliability Guarantee - This is a low voltage LED product with ETL safety certification and comes with a 90-day money-back guarantee, 24-month warranty and friendly and quick customer service.

specifications.Special Features: 6 hour off projector cycle will start when connecting to power
specifications.Warranty Description: 90 days refund guarantee & 24 months warranty & 24 hours customer service.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
